item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 15, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Clolog (129 points | 21 comments)

8. The case of the UI thread that hung in a kernel call (53 points | 9 comments)

10. Post-Silicon Validation of Static Lockstep Mode (20 points | discuss)
11. Cohere Launches Embed 4 (62 points | 32 comments)

13. Teuken-7B-Base and Teuken-7B-Instruct: Towards European LLMs (224 points | 82 comments)
14. Hacking the Postgres wire protocol (125 points | 26 comments)

21. How many supernova explode every year? (331 points | 164 comments)
22. Modern CMake (38 points | 15 comments)

26. Whistleblower details how DOGE may have taken sensitive NLRB data (560 points | 269 comments)
27. The last RadioShack in Maryland is closing (72 points | 71 comments)
28. WEIRD – a way to be on the web (85 points | 43 comments)
29. A Passion for Fruit (13 points | 1 comment)
